name: WinBall 2(HD)
description: WinBall 2(HD) is the sequel to WinBall (HD), and features 50 new levels. A new twist is the magnesium that randomly changes the trajectory of the ball which is knocked out of bricks for two new added bonuses. In addition, a loss of algorithm bonuses makes the game more interesting. Now the game two modes, normal and complicated with its increased speed and doubling of scores. The simple and intuitive interface remains however, with the configuration and ability to play on the last mileage level.
